customer_name: STAMFORD MUSEUM AND NATURE CENTER INC
site_name: STAMFORD MUSEUM AND NATURE CENTER INC

citations.narrative:
The acquisition records for the animals acquired by the Licensee since the last inspection were reviewed. A total of eight
animals had been acquired from individuals who are not licensed or registered under the AWA but their vehicle license
number and state, and the driver’s license number and state of the individuals were not recorded. Specifically: 1 rabbit; 5
degus; 1 hamster; and 1 gerbil.
Per this Section, every exhibitor shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the
following information concerning animals other than dogs and cats that are purchased or otherwise acquired, owned,
held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control: the vehicle license number and State, and
the driver’s license number (or photographic identification card for nondrivers issued by a State) and State of the person,
if he or she is not licensed or registered under the Act.
Correct from this date forward 5/24/23 for all animals that are acquired from individuals who are not licensed or registered
under the AWA.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(iii) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The acquisition records for the animals acquired by the Licensee since the last inspection were reviewed.  A total of eight 
animals had been acquired from individuals who are not licensed or registered under the AWA but their vehicle license 
number and state, and the driver’s license number and state of the individuals were not recorded. Specifically: 1 rabbit; 5 
degus; 1 hamster; and 1 gerbil. 
 
Per this Section, every exhibitor shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the 
following information concerning animals other than dogs and cats that are purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, 
held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control: the vehicle license number and State, and 
the driver’s license number (or photographic identification card for nondrivers issued by a State) and State of the person, 
if he or she is not licensed or registered under the Act.  
 
Correct from this date forward 5/24/23 for all animals that are acquired from individuals who are not licensed or registered 
under the AWA.

This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
*END OF REPORT*
